function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Negative emotions leading to lower compliance with quarantine measures","Impact":"Decreased adherence to quarantine measures and increased risk of disease spread","Mitigation":"Provision of mental health support, stress reduction techniques, and positive coping strategies","Technologies":"Telehealth services, mental health apps, virtual therapy platforms","People":"Individuals in quarantine, at-risk populations","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Unclear rules leading to lower compliance with quarantine measures","Impact":"Confusion and difficulty in adhering to guidelines, resulting in noncompliance","Mitigation":"Clear communication and education about quarantine measures, provision of easily accessible information and resources","Technologies":"Informational websites, mobile apps, interactive tools for guideline explanation","People":"General public, individuals in quarantine","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Perceived capacity and knowledge affecting compliance with quarantine measures","Impact":"Lower compliance due to practical inability to follow measures and lack of understanding about expectations","Mitigation":"Provision of resources for practical support, education on quarantine guidelines, and accessibility accommodations","Technologies":"Online tutorials, virtual support groups, accessibility tools for individuals with disabilities","People":"Individuals in quarantine, marginalized and disabled populations","Owner":"Local community organizations, public health agencies"}]}
